name: Crayola Silly Scents Mini Inspiration Art Case, Scented Crayons & Markers Set, Art Kit for Kids, Easter Basket Essentials, Coloring Supplies, Travel Gifts for Kids, Ages 4+
short_description: SILLY SCENTS ART SET: This kids' art kit includes 16 Twistable Scented Crayons, 8 Scented Washable Slim Markers, 8 Scented Washable Broad Line Markers, 20 Coloring Pages, and 1 Carrying Art Case.
SILLY SCENTS SMASHUPS: Enjoy a scent-sational twist with Silly Scents Smashups! Each marker blends two sweet scents for a delightful coloring experience.
16 TWISTABLE SCENTED CRAYONS: Add a vibrant and fragrant twist to your coloring pages or any craft project with these 16 twistable crayons.
16 SCENTED WASHABLE MARKERS: Enjoy 8 slim markers for detailed doodles and 8 broad line markers for bold strokes, each with a unique scent to make your art sessions extra special.
COLORING PAGES & ART CASE: Includes 20 coloring pages and a carrying case to keep all your art supplies organized and easily portable.

EASTER BASKET ESSENTIAL: A colorful Easter basket essential that makes the perfect Easter basket stuffer or spring craft gift for kids, adding creative Crayola fun to any Easter celebration all year long.
SAFE & NONTOXIC: Safe and nontoxic for ages 4 and up.
product_description: Discover the Crayola Silly Scents Art Set, the ultimate creative companion for young artists! This delightful kit is packed with 16 Twistable Scented Crayons, 8 Scented Washable Slim Markers, 8 Scented Washable Broad Line Markers, 20 Coloring Pages, and a handy Carrying Art Case. Each aromatic art tool adds a vibrant and fragrant twist to any coloring page or craft project, making every creation a sensory delight. The Silly Scents Smashups feature markers that blend two sweet scents, creating a scent-sational coloring experience that kids will love. With an organized storage tray, it's easy to keep all your crayons and markers neatly stored and ready for your next masterpiece. When you're done, simply fold the tray and supplies into the convenient, locking carrying case, perfect for on-the-go creativity. Ideal for kids ages 4 and up, this Silly Scents set makes a fantastic gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. Give it as an Easter basket essential— a cheerful Easter basket stuffer that adds creative fun to any spring celebration. Safe and nontoxic, it provides endless hours of creative fun while ensuring peace of mind for parents. Let your child's imagination run wild with the Crayola Silly Scents Art Set, where vibrant colors and delightful scents come together for an unforgettable artistic adventure!
